page.title: 05WINCANTON YOUTH GROUPS-NEWS
page.content: {Wincanton Area Sports Project.} During the week 5th-9th August there was not a child to be seen in the town They were up at the secondary school, King Arthurs, involved in swimming, craft, economics, trampolining, pottery, tennis and just about every other activity you can think of.It was the{Summer Activity week. { Scouting and Guiding}are very popular activities. Brownies and Guides meet in the Primary school. The 1st Winc. Scouts, Cubs and Beavers meet in the Youth club. A Scout hut is to be put up in the recreation ground. There is a desperate shortage of Scout leaders. The{Majorettes}failed in their bid to lease the town hall for practice, so they still use the primary school.When their uniforms were ruined in the wash Wincanton Transport Group donated Â£250 for new kit.
